WRITING.TEXT: If you live in the UK check out eBay! Someone is selling his ENTIRE Green Day vinyl collection. I've picked up quite a few rarities. But be prepared to pay top dollar, since many collectors have discovered the value behind his items.

WRITING.TEXT:

WRITING.TEXT: I'm not sure, my guess would be that's it's a reference to people spelling his name wrong so it "with an IE" rather than a Y

Translation - You want to be the first to hear the new song by Green Day? Fill out this simple form and answer the question : What is your favorite Green Day album ? Do it the original way to have more possibilities.
What are you waiting for? You're just one step to become one of the 20 lucky fans who can taste the newness of the Californian band before its official release!
( Fields with * are mandatory )
"Billie has the IE, Mike has the IQ, and John has ID" :)

WRITING.TITLE: SPECULATION - Bang Bang Music Video
WRITING.TEXT:
With the release of Bang Bang very soon, should we also be expecting a music video soon after. We saw the photo of Billie and we speculated a photo shoot/ music video. And the release of a music video seems to follow the pattern of a couple of weeks after the release of the single.
What are everyone's thoughts?
